item.title: Contents - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Content GWT project contains three content pages. Snapshot â€“ displays financial details like Balance Sheet (BS), Profit and Loss A/c (PL), Quarterly data (Qtr), Cash Flow (CF) and Holding details of a Symbol with forward or backward navigation capability to view other periods. It has collapsible graphs of Price, Price to Earnings (PE) and Price to Book (PB) movements. For each category a Pop up displays data for the entire period.
